events.title: Thailand moves to cut sugar in popular drinks amid health drive
events.description: Major chains agree to halve default sweetness, but street vendors and cafes remain outside sugar tax rules A crowd of customers, holding phones aloft, watch intently as Auntie Nid mixes up her bestseller: an iced Thai tea. Condensed milk is poured into a glass, followed by three heaped tablespoons of sugar, and then freshly strained tea. The end product â€“ a deep orange, creamy treat â€“ is poured into a plastic bag filled with ice. Continue reading...

events.title: Danish military evacuates U.S. submariner who needed urgent medical care off Greenland
events.description: Denmark's military says its arctic command forces evacuated a crew member of a U.S. submarine off the coast of Greenland for urgent medical treatment.

events.title: Recent updates on the arrest of former Prince Andrew
events.description: British police arrested the former Prince Andrew on suspicion of "misconduct in public office." NPR's Scott Simon speaks to royal expert Jennie Bond about the latest developments.

events.title: Winter Olympics: Closing ceremony live
events.description: After gold medals, a banned Ukrainian racer and plenty of memorable performances, the 2026 Winter Olympics come to a close. Follow the closing ceremony live with DW.

events.title: Ghana takes transatlantic slavery case to UN
events.description: Ghana's President Mahama has received the African Union's backing in pushing the United Nations to recognize transatlantic slavery as the 'gravest crime against humanity.' But will the motion pass?

events.title: Has Donald Trump lost his most powerful tariff weapon?
events.description: The US Supreme Court decision on tariffs has upended the central plank of President Donald Trump's economic and foreign policy. Will this lead to a change of course, or will Trump double down?

events.title: Secret Service shoots man dead at Trump's Mar-a-Lago
events.description: Authorities said the man breached a secure perimeter around the president's private residence and was carrying a shotgun and a fuel can.

events.title: Germans approve of democracy, but say it doesn't work well
events.description: Democracy is indispensable, according to most respondents to the new "Germany Monitor 2025" survey. However, many say it is functioning less well than in the past, and rapid change is causing great uncertainty.

events.title: A Ukrainian soldierâ€™s story: Fading hope on the front line after four years of fighting
events.description: Former DW correspondent Kostiantyn Honcharov joined the Ukrainian army in 2022. He describes the grim front-line situation after four years of fighting.

events.title: Arab, Muslim nations rebuke US envoy's Israel land claim
events.description: Mike Huckabee, the US ambassador to Israel, suggested that Israel holds a biblical entitlement to a large portion of the Middle East.

events.title: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump's 'great hospital boat'
events.description: The US president said a vessel was "on the way" to Greenland, with the move coming amid a rift between the US and Europe over control of the island. Greenland and Denmark hit back, saying no medical help is needed.

events.title: Fact check: Are China's robot soldiers just AI fakes?
events.description: Videos that suggest China may be building a robot army sound like science fiction, but social media says it's real. DW Fact Check investigates.

events.title: Trump tariffs: EU grapples with fallout of US court ruling
events.description: European leaders and businesses have responded to the US Supreme Court's decision to rule many of US President Donald Trump's tariffs illegal with both cautious optimism and deep uncertainty.

events.title: France takes home biathlon and ski mountaineering golds on penultimate day of Olympics

events.title: Team GB win record-equalling medal haul at Winter Olympics
events.description: Freestyle skier Zoe Atkin has won a bronze medal in the women's halfpipe final at the Winter Olympics in Italy.

events.title: Trump sending 'great hospital boat' to Greenland
events.description: Donald Trump has said he is sending a "great hospital boat" to Greenland, the semi-autonomous Danish territory he wants to acquire.

events.title: Arab nations condemn US ambassador's Israel remarks
events.description: Multiple Arab nations have condemned the US ambassador to Israel after he said "it would be fine" if Tel Aviv took control of almost all of the Middle East.

events.title: Display of St. Francis of Assisi's bones confirms enduring appeal of relics for Christians

events.title: Hungary says it will block a key EU loan to Ukraine until Russian oil shipments resume
events.description: Hungary says it is blocking a major EU loan for Ukraine until Russian oil starts flowing again through the Druzhba pipeline

events.title: Grain ATMs and hunger maps: AI innovations spotlighted at UN agency showcase in India
events.description: Artificial intelligence solutions that transform the way food assistance reaches people facing hunger were on display during an exhibition at an AI meeting this week in New Delhi, India.

events.title: Florida teacher charged for alleged sexual relationship with student who lived with her
events.description: An economics teacher at a Florida high school was arrested on sex offense charges after allegedly grooming a male student and providing alcohol and controlled substances to teens.

events.title: Former FBI agent offers new theory about Nancy Guthrie's disappearance: 'Personal grievance'
events.description: Nancy Guthrie's disappearance could have been motivated by a suspect with a personal grievance against her, a 25-year former FBI agent from Colorado said.

events.title: Arizona man detained in SWAT operation denies link to Nancy Guthrie abduction
events.description: Two Tucson ex-cons face online scrutiny in Nancy Guthrie case despite no official accusations. Luke Daley detained in SWAT raid, released without charges.

events.title: Truck caught on camera plowing into famed Australian synagogue in alleged hate crime
events.description: Video shows the moment a man allegedly drove a truck into the Brisbane Synagogue gates before fleeing. The suspect is facing hate crime charges.

events.title: Truck smashes into famed synagogue, police charge man with hate crime: 'Very distressing'
events.description: A man is charged with a hate crime after allegedly ramming a truck into the Brisbane Synagogue gates. The 32-year-old faces multiple charges including vilification.

events.title: Russia urges Iran, 'all parties' in Middle East to show restraint amid US military buildup
events.description: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov is calling on Iran and "all parties" in the Middle East to show restraint as the U.S. continues military buildup.
